title: Examination waiver
context: ยง461J-7 Examination waiver. The board may recommend licensing without written examination of an applicant who submits evidence satisfactory to the board that the applicant has scored equal to or higher than the established passing score of the examination administered by a testing agency selected by the board. [L 1985, c 276, pt of ยง1; am L 1989, c 148, ยง1]
